original_text: And thou shalt take the garments, and put upon Aaron the coat, and the robe of the ephod, and the ephod, and the breastplate, and gird him with the curious girdle of the ephod:
korean_text: 의복을 가져다가 아론에게 속옷과 에봇 받침 겉옷과 에봇을 입히고 흉패를 달고 에봇에 정교하게 짠 띠를 띠게 하고

sentences.original_text: And thou shalt take the garments,
and put upon Aaron the coat,
and the robe of the ephod,
and gird him with the curious girdle of the ephod:
